typeOfLoss.description: The type of business the loss applies to.

businessId.description: The unique identifier of the income source the claim relates to. Must be supplied for self-employment or foreign-property typeOfLoss. Must not be supplied for uk-property-non-fhl typeOfLoss.

typeOfClaim.description:
The type of claim to be applied.

Permitted values for "self-employment": 

    carry-forward, 

    carry-sideways

Permitted values for "uk-property-non-fhl" and "foreign-property": 

    carry-sideways,

    carry-sideways-fhl,

    carry-forward-to-carry-sideways

taxYear.description: The tax year the data applies to, for example, 2019-20. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2019-21 is not valid. The minimum tax year is 2019-20.
